sqlGroup.sql: FROM ( select t1.id,t1.res_time,t1.`status`,t2.phone,t2.name,t3.price,t3.fs,t3.type,t4.`name` ms,t5.name 'store' from ( select id,b_id,`status`,res_time,wx_id,ms_id from `order` where 1=1 <% if(!isEmpty(startDate)){ %> AND res_time>=#'$startDate$'# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(endDate)){ %> AND res_time<DATE_ADD(#'$endDate$'#,INTERVAL 1 DAY) <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(store)){ %> AND b_id=#$store$# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(status)){ %> AND `status`=#$status$# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(orderNum)){ %> AND id=#$orderNum$# <% } %> )t1 left join( select `name`,id,phone from wxuser where 1=1 <% if(!isEmpty(wxNickName)){ %> AND `name`=#$wxNickName$# <% } %> )t2 on t2.id = t1.wx_id left join( select o_id,sum(pp) price,group_concat(fs) fs,group_concat(type) type from ( select t1.o_id,t1.type, case WHEN t1.type in(1,2,3,4) THEN t2.price*t1.n ELSE t3.price*t1.n END AS 'pp', case WHEN t1.type in(1,2,3,4) THEN t4.p_id ELSE t5.p_id END AS 'fs' from ( select o_id,c_id,sum(num) n,type from order_commodity group by o_id,c_id,type )t1 LEFT JOIN filter_price t2 ON t2.id = t1.c_id LEFT JOIN oil_price t3 ON t3.id = t1.c_id LEFT JOIN filter_pic t4 ON t4.b_id = t2.b_id and t4.t_id = t2.t_id LEFT JOIN oil_pic t5 ON t5.b_id = t3.b_id and t5.e_id=t3.e_id and t5.m_id = t3.m_id )tt group by o_id )t3 on t3.o_id = t1.id left join mtser t4 on t4.id = t1.ms_id left join store t5 on t5.id = t1.b_id )t

FROM ( select t1.id,t1.res_time,t1.`status`,t2.phone,t2.name,t3.price,t3.fs,t4.ms,t5.name 'store' from ( select id,b_id,`status`,res_time,wx_id from `order` where 1=1 <% if(!isEmpty(startDate)){ %> AND res_time>=#'$startDate$'# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(endDate)){ %> AND res_time<DATE_ADD(#'$endDate$'#,INTERVAL 1 DAY) <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(store)){ %> AND b_id=#$store$# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(status)){ %> AND `status`=#$status$# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(orderNum)){ %> AND id=#$orderNum$# <% } %> )t1 left join( select `name`,id,phone from wxuser where 1=1 <% if(!isEmpty(wxNickName)){ %> AND `name`=#$wxNickName$# <% } %> )t2 on t2.id = t1.wx_id left join( select o_id,sum(pp) price,group_concat(fs) fs from ( select t1.o_id, case t1.type WHEN 1 THEN t2.price*t1.n ELSE t3.price*t1.n END AS 'pp', case t1.type WHEN 1 THEN t4.p_id ELSE t5.p_id END AS 'fs' from ( select o_id,c_id,sum(num) n,type from order_commodity group by o_id,c_id,type )t1 LEFT JOIN filter_price t2 ON t2.id = t1.c_id LEFT JOIN oil_price t3 ON t3.id = t1.c_id LEFT JOIN filter_pic t4 ON t4.b_id = t2.b_id and t4.t_id = t2.t_id LEFT JOIN oil_pic t5 ON t5.b_id = t3.b_id and t5.e_id=t3.e_id and t5.m_id = t3.m_id )tt group by o_id )t3 on t3.o_id = t1.id left join( select o_id,group_concat(`name`) ms from ( select t1.o_id,t1.ms_id,t2.`name` from order_mtser t1 left join mtser t2 on t2.id = t1.ms_id )t group by o_id )t4 on t4.o_id = t1.id left join store t5 on t5.id = t1.b_id )t
